div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2144 Sicily, c. 1837 (979) Burial: 333-2 B.C. (Zograph); 320-10 (K) Contents: c. 245 AR Siculo-Punic: 3 tetradr. (Arethusa/horse hd. 2; Heracles/horse hd. 1) Pegasi Corinth: 182 (incl. Per. V with Ε, Ν, Δ, ΑΛ, Α, ΑΡ) Alyzia: 1 Ambracia: 5 Anactorium: 4 Dyrrhachium: 3 Leucas: 43 Syracuse: 2 Unc.: 2 Disposition: Count Shuwalow, then Lenin- grad (about 140) von Koehne, MemSocd'ArchNumSt.Petersbourg 1847, pp. 121-44, illus. (not seen by K) † Zograph, NC 1928, pp. 115-30, illus.
